import React, { useState } from 'react' const Booking = () => { const [phone, setPhone] = useState(0) function handlePayment(e){ e.preventDefault() console.log(phone) fetch("/payments", { method:"POST", headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}, body: JSON.stringify({ phone:phone, amount:2000 }) }) } return (

Enter phone number to confirm payment

setPhone(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default Booking
